title: Enchanting Emerald Pushpakam Jhumka - Floral Delight
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Classic Jhumka design featuring a floral 'Pushpakam' stud. A central oval emerald is surrounded by sparkling CZ stones, creating a halo effect. The pear-shaped drop features a larger emerald in a pave-set CZ border. Meticulous craftsmanship ensures durability and timeless elegance.
colors: and warm yellow gold create a rich and captivating color palette.
occasions: and other special occasions. Adds a touch of traditional elegance to modern celebrations.
description: A timeless fusion of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The vibrant emeralds are believed to bring prosperity and good fortune. Exquisite craftsmanship ensures heirloom quality. The Hyderabadi Polish provides a radiant shine that lasts for generations. Perfect for the modern woman with a love for tradition (Sampradaya).
